questions.question: Why should I use Bedder?
questions.answer:
As a traveller, Bedder offers you an opportunity to make easy money while travelling.
1. You can book accommodations from remote areas because of its unique way to reach accommodations owner.
2. You help a local you connected with to grow his business.
3. You help a fellow traveller instead of a big company.
4. You most-likely get a better price than other websites.
5. As an accommodation owner, you don’t pay the usual 20% to 30 % fee for every booking.

questions.question: How do I use Bedder?
questions.answer:
There are many ways to use Bedder depending on what you want to do.
If you are an explorer, and want to earn money while sharing your travelling experience follow these easy steps.
1. Meet an accommodation owner.
2. Check on beddertravel.com if his accommodation is already there.
3. Create an account for the accommodation owner.
4. From your own account, create a listing in the explorer tab. Make sure you connect his account to your listing.
5. Wait for the listing to be approved. Then done!
If you want to book an accommodation, simply search for the area desire and pick your best match like any other booking website!
If you’re an accommodation owner and you want to publish your accommodation, just click on the owner tab on the left side of the screen, then on the add button. You can now create a page for your establishment and start receiving some reservation via email or phone!

questions.question: How does it work if the accommodation owner doesn’t have access to internet?
questions.answer: Easy! Bedder has a unique way to reach locals around the globe! Via the owner’s account, in the preference menu, you can choose to receive the reservation’s confirmations by text. This way, it’s easier for owners, that don’t have access to the internet or don’t know how to use a computer.

questions.question: How do I earn money?
questions.answer: Every time you enter a new listing, you get a commission for every traveller that book through our website! That’s why it is really important that the info you’re submitting is really accurate. You can make up to 15% of commission on every booking! So, the best places you discover, the more money you earn!

questions.question: How come I’m not earning any money yet?
questions.answer: Well, Bedder is in its early stage and does not have a big number of users yet. In time, we’ll convince everyone that Bedder is indeed the best platform to book your accommodation online. As long as you continue  to create great quality listings, our number of customers will grow and you’ll make more and more money.
